name: Popovers
description: These are dinner rolls times ten. They're airy, eggy, and buttery, and the golden outside crust pulls away to reveal a slightly custardy interior.
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons melted butter, plus more for greasing pan

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450°F. Grease popover pan well with butter.
In a large bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, and salt. Whisk in butter. Add flour and whisk until smooth.
Fill each cup 2/3 full with batter. Bake popovers until golden, 30 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes in pan then turn out onto wire rack. Serve immediately.
